p: Depending on precipitation, the Con.W-M treatment was irrigated three to five times for wheat and one or two times for maize. The amount of irrigation water ranged from 60 to 100 mm, based on soil moisture and farmers’ practices. Nitrogen management for the Con.W-M treatment followed farmers’ practices in the NCP. Nitrogen input was 550 kg ha −1 yr −1, of which 300 kg ha −1 yr −1 was for winter wheat and 250 kg ha −1 yr −1 was for summer maize 53.
